attributes.action: Use Centre Assessed Grades for GCSE and A Level Students in 2021
attributes.additional_details: A three week delay is not sufficient for the months of work students have missed. A three week extension on anxiety will because extreme stress, in an already stressful year. It is unfair on students. Students feel their mental health and well-being is being overlooked.
attributes.background: Cancel the GCSE and A Level exams set to take place with a three week delay in 2021. Please follow Scotland’s lead and use centre assessed grades in place of exams.

rejection.details:
